issue.title: Google Play: ru.mail.mailapp
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.mail.mailapp&hl=ru&gl=US](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dru.mail.mailapp%26hl%3Dru%26gl%3DUS) ### Comment > Если выключить в вашем приложении VPN (так необходимо делать для работы с банками или приложением Биометрия https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.rtlabs.mobile.ebs.android&hl=ru&gl=US&pli=1): https://skr.sh/sII1PyQP307 > > то рекламный баннер в приложении Mail.ru вновь появиться: (смотрите скриншот, прикрепленный в прошлом экране) > > И вновь включив VPN в вашем этот баннер уже никак не убрать: он то скрывается, но после перезахода в приложение вновь появляется (и даже перезагрузка телефона не поможет). Помогло только когда я удалил приложение Mail.ru и установил его заново > > Возможно, вы сможете либо сделать так, чтобы не приходилось переустанавливать приложение (такое как Mail.ru), чтобы ваше приложение могло после включение VPN сразу вновь ловить рекламу и скрывать её, либо же каким-либо образом сообщит об этом клиентам. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/mwTVxjh.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 13 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v3.6.10 AdGuard mode: | VPN Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `Польщщоватльский DNS-фильтр`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances,
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets Userscripts: | disabled

issue.title: gomovies.sx
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://gomovies.sx/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgomovies.sx%2F) ### Comment Username: `@GregCE5` > When using GoMovies it recently started launching Ads sometimes when you tap on a tab/function. I opened it and when I hit "home" it opened a new tab, appeared to open a couple of different things before settling on Monster.ca. Sometimes when it happens it take a coupe or clicks with the trackpad before it does something. In all the years I've used AdGuard I've never had an issue it works so well. I've not changed any of the setting. It started doing this a few weeks ago. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/cuvAtBd.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/Zedd0HA.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.10 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy

Annoyances:
I don't care about cookies,
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List Custom filters: | Easy List Other extensions used: | AdGuard is amazing. It used to work on the site I stream from https://gomovies.sx until recently. Now it randomly "freezes" when you go to click on a button. It takes another click or two for something to happen and then it opens a new tab with random promotions which themselves most often get stopped. This is only happening with GoMovies site. In all the years I've used it this is actually the first issue I've encountered, so thank you!

comment.body:
Try blocking this site, it’s working fine for me
